Reference

Available data

Data released with the package.

example_input

Example tibbles with input data in the format for (R)Congas+

example_object

Example object from (R)Congas+

Main functions

Functions to create and fit a dataset.

init()

Create a dataset.

Getters

Functions to extract information from a model.

get_input()

Extract input data.

get_fit()

Extract fit data.

stat()

Compute the statistics of a dataset.

Plotting functions

Functions to plot data and fits.

plot_data()

Plot data.

plot_fit()

Plot fits.

S3 functions

The rcongasplus S3 object functions.

print(<rcongasplus>)

Print for an object of class 'rcongasplus'.

plot(<rcongasplus>)

Plot for an object of class 'rcongasplus'.

Contents
